metadata.title: USN-6734-1 -- libvirt vulnerabilities
metadata.description: Alexander Kuznetsov discovered that libvirt incorrectly handled certain API calls. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause libvirt to crash, resulting in a denial of service. (CVE-2024-1441)  It was discovered that libvirt incorrectly handled certain RPC library API calls. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause libvirt to crash, resulting in a denial of service. (CVE-2024-2494)  It was discovered that libvirt incorrectly handled detaching certain host interfaces. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause libvirt to crash, resulting in a denial of service. (CVE-2024-2496)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6734-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libvirt-dev - 8.0.0-1ubuntu7.10 libvirt-wireshark - 8.0.0-1ubuntu7.10 libvirt-daemon-driver-qemu - 8.0.0-1ubuntu7.10 libvirt-login-shell - 8.0.0-1ubuntu7.10 libvirt-daemon-system-sysv - 8.0.0-1ubuntu7.10 libvirt-daemon-driver-lxc - 8.0.0-1ubuntu7.10 libnss-libvirt - 8.0.0-1ubuntu7.10 libvirt-daemon - 8.0.0-1ubuntu7.10 libvirt-daemon-config-nwfilter - 8.0.0-1ubuntu7.10 libvirt-daemon-driver-storage-iscsi-direct - 8.0.0-1ubuntu7.10 libvirt-daemon-system - 8.0.0-1ubuntu7.10 libvirt-clients - 8.0.0-1ubuntu7.10 libvirt-daemon-driver-storage-zfs - 8.0.0-1ubuntu7.10 libvirt-daemon-driver-xen - 8.0.0-1ubuntu7.10 libvirt-daemon-driver-vbox - 8.0.0-1ubuntu7.10 libvirt-daemon-driver-storage-gluster - 8.0.0-1ubuntu7.10 libvirt-daemon-config-network - 8.0.0-1ubuntu7.10 libvirt0 - 8.0.0-1ubuntu7.10 libvirt-daemon-system-systemd - 8.0.0-1ubuntu7.10 libvirt-sanlock - 8.0.0-1ubuntu7.10 libvirt-daemon-driver-storage-rbd - 8.0.0-1ubuntu7.10 libvirt-doc - 8.0.0-1ubuntu7.10 No subscription required
